00027 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00028 
00029 #include "DNA_meshdata_types.h"
00030 
00031 #include "BLI_math.h"
00032 #include "BLI_array.h"
00033 
00034 #include "BKE_customdata.h"
00035 
00036 #include "bmesh.h"
00037 #include "intern/bmesh_operators_private.h" /* own include */
00038 
00039 #define ELE_NEW     1
00040 
00041 void bmo_mirror_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00042 {
00043     BMOperator dupeop, weldop;
00044     BMOIter siter;
00045     BMIter iter;
00046     BMVert *v /* , *v2 */ /* UNUSED */, **vmap = NULL;
00047     BLI_array_declare(vmap);
00048     BMEdge /*  *e, */ **emap = NULL;
00049     BLI_array_declare(emap);
00050     float mtx[4][4];
00051     float imtx[4][4];
00052     float scale[3] = {1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f};
00053     float dist = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "mergedist");
00054     int i, ototvert /*, ototedge */;
00055     int axis = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "axis");
00056     int mirroru = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "mirror_u");
00057     int mirrorv = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "mirror_v");
00058 
00059     ototvert = bm->totvert;
00060     /* ototedge = bm->totedge; */ /* UNUSED */
00061     
00062     BMO_slot_mat4_get(op, "mat", mtx);
00063     invert_m4_m4(imtx, mtx);
00064     
00065     BMO_op_initf(bm, &dupeop, "dupe geom=%s", op, "geom");
00066     BMO_op_exec(bm, &dupeop);
00067     
00068     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, &dupeop, "newout", BM_ALL, ELE_NEW);
00069 
00070     /* create old -> new mappin */
00071     i = 0;
00072     /* v2 = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL); */ /* UNUSED */
00073     BMO_ITER (v, &siter, bm, &dupeop, "newout", BM_VERT) {
00074         BLI_array_growone(vmap);
00075         vmap[i] = v;
00076         /* v2 = BM_iter_step(&iter); */ /* UNUSED */
00077         i++;
00078     }
00079     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_VERT;
00080 
00081     /* feed old data to transform bmo */
00082     scale[axis] = -1.0f;
00083     BMO_op_callf(bm, "transform verts=%fv mat=%m4", ELE_NEW, mtx);
00084     BMO_op_callf(bm, "scale verts=%fv vec=%v", ELE_NEW, scale);
00085     BMO_op_callf(bm, "transform verts=%fv mat=%m4", ELE_NEW, imtx);
00086     
00087     BMO_op_init(bm, &weldop, "weldverts");
00088 
00089     v = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
00090     for (i = 0; i < ototvert; i++) {
00091         if (ABS(v->co[axis]) <= dist) {
00092             BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(bm, &weldop, "targetmap", vmap[i], v);
00093         }
00094         v = BM_iter_step(&iter);
00095     }
00096     
00097     if (mirroru || mirrorv) {
00098         BMFace *f;
00099         BMLoop *l;
00100         MLoopUV *luv;
00101         int totlayer;
00102         BMIter liter;
00103 
00104         BMO_ITER (f, &siter, bm, &dupeop, "newout", BM_FACE) {
00105             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00106                 totlayer = CustomData_number_of_layers(&bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV);
00107                 for (i = 0; i < totlayer; i++) {
00108                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV, i);
00109                     if (mirroru)
00110                         luv->uv[0] = 1.0f - luv->uv[0];
00111                     if (mirrorv)
00112                         luv->uv[1] = 1.0f - luv->uv[1];
00113                 }
00114             }
00115         }
00116     }
00117 
00118     BMO_op_exec(bm, &weldop);
00119     
00120     BMO_op_finish(bm, &weldop);
00121     BMO_op_finish(bm, &dupeop);
00122 
00123     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "newout", BM_ALL, ELE_NEW);
00124 
00125     BLI_array_free(vmap);
00126     BLI_array_free(emap);
00127 }
